<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping"><sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><condition_script><![CDATA[(function() {
    if (((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('TV') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Tivo') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Chromecast') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Cisco-DMP') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('WorkCentre') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('JetDirect') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('LaserJet') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Ricoh') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Phaser') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile === 'Zebra' || input.temp.u_ctssecuritygroup.indexOf('Printer') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Camera') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Axis-Device') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('IoT') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Switch') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Router') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Viptela') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('XBOX') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('PlayStation') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Nintendo') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('netgear') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('linksys') > -1 || input.temp.u_ctssecuritygroup.indexOf('Infrastructure') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('American-Power-Conversion-Device') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('UPS') > -1)) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('Access-Point') > -1 || input.temp.u_endpointprofile.endsWith('AP'))) && !((input.temp.u_endpointprofile.indexOf('IP-Phone') > -1))) {
        return true;
    }
    return false;
})();]]></condition_script><encoded_query>u_endpointprofileLIKETV^ORu_endpointprofileLIKETivo^ORu_endpointprofileLIKEChromecast^ORu_endpointprofileLIKECisco-DMP</encoded_query><entity_mapping_group>8bc17dbe9725f950bd8ff0021153af4b</entity_mapping_group><ignore>true</ignore><is_conditional>true</is_conditional><name>tempToSmart Television 1</name><order>1100</order><source_sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">0483957a97a1f950bd8ff0021153afa7</source_sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jamie@moderncyber.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-01 19:11:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>83c139fe9725f950bd8ff0021153af03</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tempToSmart Television 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco ISE" source="x_caci_cisco_ise">094d27ca97213950bd8ff0021153af4a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="Cisco ISE ETL">ea73d17a97a1f950bd8ff0021153af8e</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_scope display_value="Cisco ISE">094d27ca97213950bd8ff0021153af4a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping_83c139fe9725f950bd8ff0021153af03</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jamie@moderncyber.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-01 20:07:44</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="Smart Television 1">07c139fe9725f950bd8ff0021153af01</target_sys_rte_eb_entity></sys_rte_eb_entity_mapping></record_update>
